overview: The secret life of lesbian guidance counselor Sophie Hobbs begins to unravel when professor St. Michaels learns of Sophie's tryst with the older woman's favorite student. Determined to get rid of the troublesome Sophie, Magdalene hires a gorgeous new student advisor to give the unethical Ms. Hobbs some much needed competition. But as Sophie struggles to control her lesbian urges, curvy student Bella proves the sex crazed counselor still can't resist a hot young girl.
title: Lesbian Guidance Counselor 3
